physics
Class Satellite

java.lang.Object
  common.Entity
      physics.Satellite

public class Satellite
extends Entity

Poorly designed data structure. MySphere contains coordinates and color values as well, but they aren't used.

Author:
Mike Facelle

gravitationalForce

public float[] gravitationalForce()
Computes the gravitational force, assuming it to be rotating around (0,0,0).

Returns:
F_G = Gm1m2 / r^2, in [x,y,z] form

gravitationalForce

public static float gravitationalForce(float m1,
                                       float m2,
                                       float r)
Static method. Computes gravitational force between two masses, m1 and m2.

Returns:
F_G = Gm1m2 / r^2
